p: Potential antiproliferative and anticancer activities of some species of Caralluma were reported in many earlier research works. The methanolic extract of Caralluma acutangula exhibited effects with concentrations varying between 0 and 50 μg/ml on MCF-7 (breast cancer) and HEPG2 (hepatocellular carcinoma) [ 44]. The methanolic extracts of Caralluma acutangula possess an interesting antiproliferative activity on HeLa (cervix cancer), MCF7 (breast cancer), and HEPG2 (hepatocellular carcinoma) cells [ 45].
